mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(review_id) FROM review WHERE is_deleted = 0
SELECT review_id , review_title , review_content FROM review WHERE is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY review_id DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT r.review_id , r.review_title , r.review_content , r.rating , r.user_id , r.is_deleted , r.created_at , u.user_name FROM review r LEFT JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id WHERE r.review_id = #{id} AND r.is_deleted = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (review_title, review_content, rating, order_id, car_info_id, user_id) VALUES (#{reviewTitle}, #{reviewContent}, #{rating}, #{orderId}, #{carInfoId}, #{userId})
